column5: I'm looking for a recommendation for a place that can replace the CRAPPY zippers on my clam.  I don't know what type but anything would be better than the ones that are on there.  I live in stouffville and work in scarborough.
Port Perry Auto Glass and Upholstery have looked after things like this for me in the past.  Great people.  They do boats and cars, most everything.
Sport sewing shop on gerrard in Toronto
Whats wrong with your zippers?  S.
They won't zip.  They keep "popping" and won't stay zipped.  The zippers on the clams are not the most industrial.  I could send it back to clam but shipping cost would be CRAZY!

Take some pictures and email to clam customer service.  You never know... They do have a great warranty.  Last year, the tub cracked on my one man flip over.  Sent a few pics to them with an explanation as to what happened, within a week, I had a new tub delivered via UPS free of charge.  The clam was 4 years old, and they replaced it no questions asked..  It's worth a shot..
